author: abcoathup
content:
g11tech was added as a core eip editor: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6497

I assume this is part of the initiative to get consensus layer devs to use the EIP process and make it easier for them.  I can see that g11tech is a contributor to Lodestar,

Is there any public information on this, as couldn't see any in the PR?  More for transparency.

author: lightclient
content:

author: abcoathup
content:
Good to see CL teams being added as core EIP editors.

Thanks for the info, I hadn't seen any specifics in the EIPIP meeting summary notes: https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/210#issuecomment-1423000053 and don't have access to the EIP-editors chat.
